name: ashtech/nri-testimonials
title: NRI Testimonials
description: NRI testimonials section with 3 editable testimonials

title.default:
Stories of Confidence, Trust, and Commitment
from Our Global Residents

test1Text.default: I booked my residence at Ashtech Presidential Towers from Dubai without a single site visit. The process was completely digital, and the team kept me updated throughout.

test2Text.default: The combination of quality, trust, and location made this an easy decision. Ashtech's NRI team handled everything seamlessly.

test3Text.default: It's reassuring to invest with a developer that understands both luxury and long-term value.

footerText.default: Each story is a testament to the trust our global community places in Ashtech.
